attributes.action: Michael Gove clearly doesn't understand the teaching profession and needs to go!
attributes.additional_details: Michael Gove keeps on telling the media his opinion on our teaching profession and clearly has never stood in front of a class of teenagers. He inflames opinion against him amongst teachers on a regular basis and after today's news about him getting rid of teachers within a term, he clearly needs to be removed from office and replaced by an education secretary who understands the needs and constraints of teachers.
